SEARCH
Package com.vrm.client

Class ClientManager

java.lang.Object
com.vrm.client.ClientManager
public class ClientManager extends Object
Manages array of clients. Adds, removes, retrieves, and updates client information.

    • retrieveClient

      public Client retrieveClient(String name)
      Retrieves a client by their name. Case-insensitive search.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the client to search for.
      Returns:
      The Client object if found, otherwise null.

    • addClient

      public boolean addClient(Client client)
      Adds a new client to the manager. Stores a copy of the client object.
      Parameters:
      client - The Client object to add.
      Returns:
      True if the client was added successfully, false if the array is full.
